name: CPVoiceControlTemplate
desc: A template that displays a voice control indicator during audio input.

items.name: init(voiceControlStates: [CPVoiceControlState])
items.desc: Creates a voice control template with a list of voice control states.

items.name: class CPVoiceControlState
items.desc: A voice control state containing title variants and images for use by a voice control template.

items.name: func activateVoiceControlState(withIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Changes the template’s state to the one matching the specified identifier.

items.name: var activeStateIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier of the template’s current voice control state.

items.name: var voiceControlStates: [CPVoiceControlState]
items.desc: The array of voice control states available to the template.
